welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Izumisano, Japan – a charming city known for its beautiful coastline, delicious seafood, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's free Wi-Fi network by registering with a valid email address.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kobe Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kobe Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving domestic flights within Japan.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Itami Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers and some international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'ITM Free WiFi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.
